name: Player
message: You were the strange lady in my dreams...

name: Player
message: Who are you? What is this place?

name: Player
message: Wired... people call me Godfrey of Runswick...

name: Colnel Godfrey
message: Uhh... What uhh.. what a coincidence...

name: Colnel Godfrey
message: I brought you here... Because I need your help...

name: Godfrey of Runswick
message: What do you, a warrior from the future need me for?

name: Colnel Godfrey
message: I will explain later now you have to trust me and come with me...
